testcaseName: Interval of < 24 days between an invalid VZ and a subsequent MMRV=not valid VZ
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from live virus vaccine
generalDescription: This test case describes when a MMRV (PROQUAD) vaccine is administered less than 24 days from an invalid dose of varicella vaccine dose, that the dose is not valid.  Forecast dose #1 of varicella vaccine.
reasonForChange: Forecast Dates were forecasting Dose 2, but the patient is still trying to satisfy target dose #1.  Dates were updated to reflect a forecast for dose 1 based on live virus spacing.
